Header: “Last Christmas” scheduled to be released this Friday
Content: “Last Christmas” is an upcoming romantic comedy film directed by Paul Feig and written by Bryony Kimmings and Emma Thompson, who co-wrote the story with her husband, Greg Wise. It stars Emilia Clarke and Henry Golding. A young woman named Kate, who has been continuously unlucky, accepts a job as a department store elf during the Christmas holidays. When Kate meets Tom on the job, her life takes an unexpected turn. The film is scheduled to be released this Friday in the United States and Canada.
